subject: Re: Fwd: Website Updates
preview: Hi Heath,  I hope you've been well and enjoyed your break.  Just a few things regarding the updates.  When the guests are choosing the pizza can the choice stop at two? It currently allows them to cli

full_threads.body:
Hi Heath, I hope you've been well and enjoyed your break. Just a few things regarding the updates.
  • When the guests are choosing the pizza can the choice stop at two? It currently allows them to click above 2 pizzas.
  • The add on section has some items that are "each" and some "per person" the ones that the guests can pick each is calculating by the amount of people they have attending which works well for the per person add on.
Can the "each" addons maybe have a separate part where if they do decide to pick any of those they can then also say have a quantity ie - chicken skewers x 1,2,3,4 and so on?
  • The kids meals only allows the guests to choose one kids meal.
If you have any questions please do not hesitate to email or call me. Kind regards, BILLY ZALOUMIS THE PAPER MILL FOOD 20 SHEPHERD STREET LIVERPOOL NSW 2170 T. +61 2 8742 4033 W. WWW.THEPAPERMILLFOOD.COM E. VASILI@THEPAPERMILLFOOD.COM The Paper Mill Food notice and disclaimer: the information contained in this email (including attachments) is confidential and privileged. In the event that this email transmission is received in error, please inform the sender by return email then delete this email and your reply from your records. The Paper Mill Food does not warrant that information or data in this email transmission is error or virus free. The receivers of this email transmission shall ascertain the accuracy and completeness of the information or data received. Although computer virus scanning software is used by The Paper Mill Food, the receivers of this email shall be responsible for the extent and sufficiency of their own virus protection. Any confidentiality or privilege is not waived or lost because this email has been sent to you. Copyright in this communication belongs to The Paper Mill Trust or one of its affiliates.

Hi Billy, 

Hope you have been well. We have now made the below changes for you. 

You can view the updated from here: 
https://thepapermillfood.com/group-bookings-payment/

Please note, we will create the subtotal page breakdown once all of the fields are confirmed as this needs to be custom coded.

action.text: Heath Maguire changed the customer to Billy @ the Paper Mill Food

full_threads.body:

Heath Maguire

Wolf IQ
Level 2, 383 George Street, Sydney NSW 2000

ID0EC
Begin forwarded message:
From: "Billy @ The Paper Mill Food" <billy@thepapermillfood.com>
Subject: Website Updates
Date: 27 December 2021 at 1:58:06 pm AEDT
To: "heath@wolfiq.com.au" <heath@wolfiq.com.au>
Cc: "Rula Aridah @ The Paper Mill Food" <Rula@thepapermillfood.com>

Hi Heath,

I hope you've had a great Christmas.

We would like to make some changes to the group menu tab. If these are possible and we are open to any suggestions. This may be all over the place so bear with me and apologies for any confusion. If any of this doesn't make sense just email me or @Rula Aridah @ The Paper Mill Food.

When they go to our groups tab, choose either $55 or $65 menu. It asks how many adults and children. Can they choose the kids meals in a drop box so they have to pick.
Could we have a tab there also for how many guests are Gluten Free and or Vegetarian.
It currently says any choice of two wood fired pizzas. Could this be drop box for them to choose their two pizzas? We are trying to eliminate the back and forth and so if we could receive this prior to the guests event it would great.

After they have chosen which menu they would like to go with and have chosen their pizzas. Could we add a page or drop box with "enhancements" ie Add Kibbeh, Add Samke Harra?

The $55 menu would have the following.
Add Kibbeh 3 for - $12
Add Samke Harra - $16
Add Anayia Lamb - $14 each
Add Chicken Skewers - $9 each
Add Lamb Skewers - $12 each
Add Spaghetti Bolognese - $15 Per person
Add Penne Pesto - $15 Per person
Add Linguine Con Le Vongole (fresh clams) - $15 Per person
Spaghetti Carbonara - $15 Per person
Penne Alla Norma (Vegetarian) - $15 Per person
Add Coffee Parfait - $5 Per person

The $65 menu only needs to have the following enhancements.
Add Chicken Skewers - $9 each
Add Lamb Skewers - $12 each
Add Spaghetti Bolognese - $15 Per person
Add Penne Pesto - $15 Per person
Add Linguine Con Le Vongole (fresh clams) - $15 Per person
Spaghetti Carbonara - $15 Per person
Penne Alla Norma (Vegetarian) - $15 Per person

After all these options and enhancements have been made by the guests a subtotal page breaking down what they have and finally the payment.


For the event enquiry could we please just amend the automated email that gets sent to the below

Hi,

Thank you for your recent enquiry for the event rooms in Firepit, we would love to help you celebrate your event.

You would be looking at a minimum spend which will give you exclusive hire of the space three hours (lunch)/ four hours (dinner) duration.
Please note that we are currently not holding tentative bookings on the space, a 25% deposit of the minimum spend is required to secure your booking.

Our timings are either a 12:00pm,12:30pm start time for lunch and 5:00pm, 5:30pm or 6:00pm start time for dinner.

I have attached our current menus for you to view for both food and beverage options, let me know what you think?

Check out some images to give you an idea of our space which I feel would be ideal for your special day based on your numbers.

If you are after casual dining this is not a private space or a serviced area.
Please head over to our website and click group bookings. https://thepapermillfood.com/group-bookings/

I have also attached the updated event enquiry form that you amended with Rula. If we could please update this with the attached file that would be great.

Thank you for all your help in this matter! if you have any questions please do not hesitate to contact us.

Kindest regards,

VASILI ZALOUMIS




THE PAPER MILL FOOD
20 SHEPHERD STREET
LIVERPOOL NSW 2170 T. +61 2 8742 4033
W. WWW.THEPAPERMILLFOOD.COM
E. BILLY@THEPAPERMILLFOOD.COM
